title: Extent the Great Depression fostered reform

content.question: Evaluate the extent to which the Great Depression fostered ongoing reform in the United States in the period from 1929 to 1945.

frqParts.text: Evaluate the extent to which the Great Depression fostered ongoing reform in the United States in the period from 1929 to 1945.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
